oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ANALYSIS AND FORECASTING OF WINDS AND WAVES FOR A FLOATING TYPE WIND TURBINE
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Mase, Hajime
Yasuda, Tomohiro
Mori, Nobuhito
Tom, Tracey H.
Ikemoto, Ai
Utsunomiya, Tomoaki
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: floating type wind turbine
design parameters
winds and waves forecasting
forecasting system
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The floating type wind turbine demonstration project has been promoted in Japan. In 2012, a 1:2 scale model was installed off Kabashima Island in Nagasaki Prefecture. And a year later, a full scale model was installed. For the design of the wind turbine's floating body, winds, waves and other parameters were analyzed. For the construction and daily management, a prediction system was developed and the predictions and observations of winds and waves were compared and the agreement between them was good.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 34 (2014): Proceedings of 34th Conference on Coastal Engineering, Seoul, Korea, 2014; waves.21
